description: This file defines an inline utility function 'getRFCConfig' within the 'Utils' namespace that retrieves RFC configuration parameters using an external API. It includes licensing information, header guards, and a function that interacts with external RFC API functions.

methods.name: bool getRFCConfig(const char * paramName,RFC_ParamData_t & paramOutput)
methods.description: Utility function to retrieve RFC configuration parameters, returning true if retrieval was successful or default value, using an external RFC API.

ctags.name: getRFCConfig
ctags.pattern: /^inline bool getRFCConfig(const char* paramName, RFC_ParamData_t& paramOutput)$/
